title: Spyder Bones
description: It's the summer of 1969 and Aaron Prescott is a seasoned soldier. After serving one tour of duty in Vietnam as a cavalryman, Aaron returns for a second tour as a combat medic.Aaron's life revolves around the love of his Vietnamese girlfriend, the danger of combat and his passion for music. It's not an overly complicated existence. But that's about to change.After suffering a near death experience during combat, followed by months in a coma, Aaron will need to make some difficult decisions. Were the experiences he endured in a coma real? If they were, it means there is a much larger war raging unseen all around us. And, he may now be a part of it.
author: Oliver Phipps
